name: YaySwap
description: YaySwap is the first hybrid DEX platform on the Cardano Blockchain that integrates both an Automated Market Maker and an order book.YaySwap is poised to become the go-to decentralized finance (DeFi) solution for smart-swaps in Cardano. Our unique technology will allow traders to effortlessly execute smart contract-based trades at a fraction of the cost of similar services provided by other decentralized exchanges while safely trading digital assets.
